positive.review: Great free software, never had any issues with it. Works well with any streaming and recording app.
Simple and easy to use. Youtube has lots of tutorials to help set it up too.
amazing app for any vtubers out there. you can test it out before you spend money to remove the watermark as well
A NEED for vtubers, easy to use and easy to customize anything and everything from your model to the expressions and hotkeys

I use this program daily for streaming and I would highly recommend it to anyone that uses or plans to use a 2D V-tube avatar. it can be as simple or as complex as you like adding items for viewers to add to your model for fun or trigger special effects.

Best Live2D software! 
It is great for anyone looking to become a 2D Vtuber. Face tracking with a webcam or your phone is available! Has great base models and easy to port other models. Can seem overwhelming at the start but Youtube video guides are a blessing!

Will say that the phone software[APP] for IOS I got, I had to pay to stay connected but I have heard others say when they got the app they didnt have to pay for it. I dont know how but that is something to look into before buying the phone app if you wanna use your IOS for better face tracking! 

‚ô• Definitely a great software ‚ô•

VTube Studio has consistent high quality and a relatively easy learning curve. There are plenty of tutorials online to walk you through your first steps. The DLCs are nice but not necessary for casual use/practice. If you're just going to be on call with friends then you can get by entirely for free! As for streaming, you'll probably want to look into purchasing your own model. But plenty are available online, and it can feel quite rewarding (and addicting) to own your own model(s). Overall worth the download to just mess around with at worst, and a great choice for those with an interest in VTubing as a serious hobby as well.
Simple and easy to use. Also thank you so much for backing up my models automatically it actually saved me from disaster
Understandable why this is the official vtubing app, 5 starting models + adjustment options!?! absolutely amazing
Fairly simple and intuitive VTubing software, mostly using it in discord with friends.

I really love this software! 
The developer does a really good job keeping it updated and adding new features.
My only complain is that the interface could be more readable.
I can't never remember what the buttons do and I wish the backgrounds selection menu had a little preview.

highly reccomennd supports so many connections for a lot of things like obs, twitch, stream extnsions, stream bot commands, etc and 
the amount of tutorials out there is amazing very awsesome tool for content creators meowmeowmeowemwoew
i liek it

This program is crucial and essential for any VTuber!

Over the years the devs have added more interesting features and improved upon previous that help improve the quality of life when streaming, and the over all quality of the tracking.

This is the gold-standard of Live2D Vtubing tracking software that all others are compared against. Great free feature-set although I do recommend using a iPhone for facial tracking rather than a webcam.
nice app for youtubers content creation
Simple, easy to use and understand.

The updates are good for reading. Even with my new 2.0 Model that uses VBridger, it was so easy to calibrate as well.

As a new rising Vtuber, it brings me now some relief that I cna even adjust the gesture commands without needing a gesture deck or some additonal hardware as well
its the go-to vtubing program for a reason
Learning this program right now, and I am so excited. Can't wait to stream with my model soon!
Very easy to use and versatile.

VTube Studio 2025: My 2D Waifu Came Alive and Now She Judges My Life Choices! ü¶äüì∏ 10/10 Rigging Therapy
Listen up, aspiring PNGtubers and pro-rigging masochists‚ÄîI turned my potato PC into a virtual idol factory, and now my anime avatar roasts me harder than chat during a speedrun fail. Face tracking? Flawless. Blink once, she blinks. Sneeze? She explodes into ahegao particles (thanks, custom expressions). Lip-sync hits like autotune on steroids‚Äîmumble "uwu" and she purrs it back in 60FPS glory.
Hotkeys = godsend: Press F for emergency "brb pooping" overlay, or spam Spacebar to make her twerk through donation alerts. Steam Workshop physics? Boing-boing heaven‚Äîmy model's chest defies gravity harder than my GPA. iPhone FaceID tracking works from the toilet (yes, I tested). Android? Free app, zero excuses for ugly rigs.
Pros: Live2D cubism integration smoother than your mom's alimony, Steam Overlay for mid-stream memes, dev updates faster than my caffeine crashes. Cons: Calibration takes 5 mins (cry about it), and if your mic sucks, she‚Äôll mouth-breathe like Darth Vader on helium.
Spent 300+ hours making my gremlin OC dab on haters‚Äînow she has more subs than my OnlyFans (it‚Äôs SFW, calm down). If you‚Äôve ever wanted a digital girlfriend who never ghosts but WILL call you a degenerate, BUY IT. Zero regrets, infinite emotes. Highly Recommended! üé§‚ú®
Great free software, never had any issues with it. Works well with any streaming and recording app.

I will always recommend VTube studio! So happy it is on steam. It can be overwhelming if it's your first time trying it out - but there are some really helpful turtorials on Youtube to help you out if needed! <3
Easy to use for the most part. Would be more helpful if there was a tutorial video showing how to set it up. I was able to find YouTube videos that help. But other than that, its great!
Simple and easy to use. Youtube has lots of tutorials to help set it up too.

So far (4 days in) I am able to learn this software fairly intuitively. There are LOTS of youtube tutorials for just about anything you can think of doing with your Vtuber and this software. Highly recommend
It was a little fiddly to work out as a complete beginner, but it's been working fine once I got it worked out. Absolutely love my Vtube model that I got out of Etsy and works seamlessly.
I like streaming and this app makes it easy. Love how simple it is to connect with other programs.
Super easy to use & pretty intuitive. I've been having a lot of fun experimenting with uploading new models. Super easy to import into OBS.

The DLCs are nice but not necessary for casual use/practice. If you're just going to be on call with friends then you can get by entirely for free! This is streaming software for weebs. 'Nuff said.

...Well, it probably doesn't have to be, but it's interesting that plenty of included characters look like they should be featured in a manga. However, that's not going to be the focus of this review.

VTube Studio by itself is free software, although you could pay for some models and the multiplayer collab DLC, but it's not really necessary. Also, if you don't mind cropping or using special OBS plugins, you can totally remove that watermark for free... üòè

The base software is actually pretty robust OOTB. You have a myriad of options to customize sensitivity, webcam, model positioning, and more. There's even the ability to add your own models, if you so desire. One drawback I can see is that they all have to be 2D, meaning it uses a series of images and simple animations instead of true 3D models. However, that could be seen as a benefit, because it would run better on lower-end hardware than something like Animaze.

I'm not sure why it is tagged "Mature" or "NSFW"; all I can assume is that it has the potential of using some lewd models, but from what I've seen, it doesn't have that by default, so it should be fine for those who want clean-ish streaming software to replace their face with some character of their choosing.

I really love this software! 
The developer does a really good job keeping it updated and adding new features.
My only complain is that the interface could be more readable.
I can't never remember what the buttons do and I wish the backgrounds selection menu had a little preview.
It takes a bit of getting used to, but its fantastic once you get the hang of it! I hope to start streaming with my husband soon, we can't wait to get lovely new models to use in vstudio!

highly reccomennd supports so many connections for a lot of things like obs, twitch, stream extnsions, stream bot commands, etc and 
the amount of tutorials out there is amazing very awsesome tool for content creators meowmeowmeowemwoew
i liek it

This program is crucial and essential for any VTuber!

Over the years the devs have added more interesting features and improved upon previous that help improve the quality of life when streaming, and the over all quality of the tracking.
took a bit of learning and some work but is worth it if you really want to take your time and figure it out

This is the gold-standard of Live2D Vtubing tracking software that all others are compared against. Great free feature-set although I do recommend using a iPhone for facial tracking rather than a webcam.
nice app for youtubers content creation

VTube Studio has completely transformed my streaming experience and exceeded all my expectations. The software is incredibly intuitive and easy to set up, even for beginners with no prior VTubing experience. I was amazed by how responsive the face tracking is, capturing even subtle facial movements with impressive precision. The ability to customize hotkeys for different expressions and animations makes streaming feel dynamic and engaging. One of my favorite features is the item system, which allows you to add PNG props that interact naturally with your model's movements. The cross-platform functionality is brilliant, letting me use my smartphone as a tracking device without any noticeable lag. The developer DenchiSoft clearly listens to community feedback and regularly updates the software with new features. For a free-to-play application, VTube Studio offers professional-grade quality that rivals paid alternatives. The optional watermark removal DLC is reasonably priced and well worth it for serious streamers. I highly recommend VTube Studio to anyone interested in Live2D VTubing, whether you're a hobbyist or a professional content creator.
Simple, easy to use and understand.

I've been Vtubing for a year and a half now (as of this review) and it's basically one of the only pieces of software available to do so. That being said, it does run well and does have many ways to Vtube with many ways to express yourself. I use this on Linux as well, so if you're an up and coming and want to play on Linux, I can confirm it's possible. They've also recently added mocap features as well for the truly insane. My only wish is that it was available to download on itch.io as well so I didn't have to depend on Steam since using a bat file isn't an option. In any case, happy Vtubing!
VTube Studio. A perfect start for my dream of becoming a VTuber!
I would recommend this to friends that would like use vtube models it svery smooth and run great
Great software and easy to use a must for Vtubing. 10/10
Quite straightforward and good model tracking. If you're starting out, you can just use a webcam for tracking and it works fine.

Honestly fun and definitely worth trying since it's free!
I'd love an option to skip the 'double click...wait...options slide in with an animation' time to just them appearing, as well as some kind of visual on-screen indicator of toggles and on-screen buttons (I don't use OBS, it's just for friends on discord so i use it as a webcam w/no chromakeying)

Works great and can support a lot of fun stuff like having twitch chatters use channel points to toggle effects and objects. interface is easy to understand and adjusting tracking parameters is pretty intuitive. Plus it's free so like.  can't beat that.
I use this for VTubing and I love it. I cannot imagine using another option.
Very easy to use for Vtubing, Pretty easy to understand how everything works.
This is the perfect program if you are a vtuber Simple review for a simple program :)

negative.review: its genuinely really good, but there are microtransactions almost everywhere, just to use the app theres a moving watermark.
don't become a vtuber, worst mistake i've ever made. some dude paid me $7,000 because he wanted to be my e-boyfriend
its genuinely really good, but there are microtransactions almost everywhere, just to use the app theres a moving watermark.

This app will function on Linux with Proton, but the only problem is the webcam support.

WineHQ teams has not fixed a webcam driver problems and this app is required to have webcam support or else people can't switch to Linux until [b]A: Make a Linux Native[/b] or [b]B: Include a webcam support for WineHQ[/b] and there are no plans on either of these workarounds except deal with third party workaround which it's bad.

I was able to connect to PC before... for free.. now i am getting kicked out after 5 mins... getting forced to buy premium... like it cost them resources.... Big Shame. It also use older version on ios :)
i honestly think This garbage from using this it honestly sucks using a webcam for it and does not work just a green screen no image on streamlabs and obs webcam capture for streaming
don't become a vtuber, worst mistake i've ever made. some dude paid me $7,000 because he wanted to be my e-boyfriend

WineHQ teams has not fixed a webcam driver problems and this app is required to have webcam support or else people can't switch to Linux until [b]A: Make a Linux Native[/b] or [b]B: Include a webcam support for WineHQ[/b] and there are no plans on either of these workarounds except deal with third party workaround which it's bad.

I was able to connect to PC before... for free.. now i am getting kicked out after 5 mins... getting forced to buy premium... like it cost them resources.... Big Shame. It also use older version on ios :)
i honestly think This garbage from using this it honestly sucks using a webcam for it and does not work just a green screen no image on streamlabs and obs webcam capture for streaming
don't become a vtuber, worst mistake i've ever made. some dude paid me $7,000 because he wanted to be my e-boyfriend

I would recommend this game. However, people would just pass over the review without a second thought. I do very much like VTube. However, they added the watermark and put it behind a paywall.
